StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertMisGauge]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@OrgID int, @RecruiterID uniqueidentifier, @CalendarYear int, @Month int
AS BEGIN
DECLARE @SchoolYear int
IF @Month = 7 OR @Month = 8 OR @Month = 9 OR @Month = 10 OR @Month = 11 OR @Month = 12 BEGIN SET @SchoolYear = @CalendarYear + 1 END ELSE BEGIN SET @SchoolYear = @CalendarYear END
-- STEP 1: Start the transac.on BEGIN TRANSACTION
INSERT INTO [RSSOSS].[USMC].[MisGauge] SELECT NEWID() ,hs.RowGuid AS SchoolID ,@CalendarYear ,@Month , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROSPECTING.USMC.ProspectSchool s INNER JOIN PROSPECTING.USMC.Prospect p ON s.ProspectId = p.ProspectId where SchoolId = hs.RowGuid AND p.ProspectDisposi.onId = 2) as PacCount ,GETDATE() FROM
MCRISS.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL hs INNER JOIN USMC.MapsSectorZip msz ON LEFT(hs.ZIP_CODE, 5) = msz.Zip INNER JOIN USMC.MapsSector ms ON ms.SectorID = msz.SectorID LEFT OUTER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL_PROFILE hsp ON hsp.SCHOOL_CODE = hs.SCHOOL_CODE AND hsp.SCHOOL_YEAR = @SchoolYear WHERE msz.Zip IN (
SELECT Zip FROM USMC.MapsSectorZip
WHERE SectorID IN ( SELECT ms.SectorID FROM USMC.MapsSector ms INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION org ON ms.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId = org.rowguid LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.MapsSectorRecruiter msr ON ms.SectorID = msr.SectorID WHERE org.ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND ( Recrui.ngPersonId = @RecruiterID OR @RecruiterID IS NULL) ) ) AND hs.School_Type = 'HS'
-- Rollback the transac.on if there were any errors IF @@ERROR <> 0 BEGIN -- Rollback the transac.on ROLLBACK TRANSACTION
-- Raise an error and return RAISERROR ('Error occurred while performing the change.', 16, 1) RETURN END
-- STEP 4: If we reach this point, the commands completed successfully -- Commit the transac.on.... COMMIT TRANSACTION
END
